about_the_game:
About the Trial Version

The trial version allows you to play up to the middle of a limited course. (No limit on continues).
The official release is still some way off, but we hope you will wait with anticipation, and your advice and feedback on ASURA are most welcome. Please do!

- The trial version is scheduled to be available until October 16, 2023. After that, we will close the trial version and concentrate on the development of the full version, which we aim to release around February 2024. Please wait with anticipation.

About this game

Respect and homage to the arcade games of the 80s and 90s,
This is an arcade-style 3D shooter with speed and exhilaration.
Play as Asura, a humanoid battle weapon, and destroy invaders from outer space.

Operation Description

- ASURA OPERATIONS - Move with the left stick or D-pad. However, when in neutral, it automatically returns to the center.
- Energy Shot - Attack with the shot button.
- Shining Knuckle - Press and hold the punch button, then release to punch.
- Lightning Over Drive - Pressing the slow button slows down the flow of time except for ASURA

Play as Asura, a humanoid battle weapon, and destroy the invaders from outer space.

Destroy the invaders that are swarming around.

Cut through the crisis with Lightning Overdrive!

.

Defeating strong enemies with a single blow with Shining Knuckles!

The dreaded invader boss!

About the Production Staff

.LeftOver" is a new indie brand with only two production staff.
We plan, program, design, produce sound, and do everything else together.
The pace of production is slow, but we will do our best to make a good product. Please support us and add us to your wish list.
